attributes.action: Support the proposed expansion of Heathrow airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently Heathrow is in decline which is bad for the UK economy. It has to be allowed to expand to stay in competition with  it's rivals - Frankfurt, Schipol, CDG. Build the third runway, build terminal 6

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
